whoIAm1: I'm a Computer Engineering student at Inha University (B.Eng., 2022-expected 2028) with interests in Edge AI and parallel computing/GPGPU. I focus on building efficient AI systems for on-device environments, including TinyML, embedded machine learning, and model compression techniques such as quantization and pruning. I'm also interested in Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM)
whoIAm2: I'm interested in solo indie game development using Godot.

project-1.title: Dental Android XR Application
project-1.desc: Developed an Android XR dental app with on-device tooth segmentation using a custom YOLO model optimized for mobile, and reduced inference latency from 186 ms to 18 ms via GPU runtime delegation.

project-2.title: Inha Pass
project-2.desc: Maintained and enhanced Inha University's official Android app and built the “인하 출입카드” app, achieving 5,000+ downloads and a 4.6 average rating on Google Play.

project-3.title: Onetablet Data
project-3.desc: Automated preprocessing and data pipelines for public API data on GCP and designed schemas with data quality checks for consistent storage and analytics.

project-4.title: Incheon Support Center for Foreign Residents
project-4.desc: Built an automated workers' compensation claim PDF generator in Node.js (pdf-lib) with template overlay and Korean font support, and implemented 8-language localization with persisted user preferences.
